description:
Love is in the air when Tetsuya dances his way onto the stage to fight with— and for— the girl of his dreams. We learn some secrets about a mysterious member of Team Goddess, and Kyoya deals with his doubts about a member of Disaster
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Dancing Demon Takes on Medusa!
ダンシングファイト! 魔王vsメデューサ
